name: DistributionChart
functionalRequirements:
## Distribution Chart

### Purpose
Show distribution of deal velocity values.

### Features
- Histogram or box plot
- Statistical indicators
- Outlier detection
- Hover details

dataRequirements.description: Visualizes statistical distribution of deal velocity values

entities.name: Deals
entities.description: Deal data for velocity distribution analysis
entities.usageContext: Velocity values calculated and passed as distribution array

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- distributionData: Array of velocity values
- bins: Number of histogram bins

### Visualization
- ECharts histogram

properties.name: distributionData
properties.description: Array of velocity values for distribution
